expectations: An authentic, high value experience for attendees and sponsors focused on creative JavaScript and web development.
The top priority for HalfStack is the attendee experience, with great food, drinks, talks, swag, and community.
HalfStack carefully curates talks that inspire and inform the audience in a highly interactive and entertaining manner. An intimate feeling where each attendee has time to meet one another
Organizations are invited to help our event through sponsorship. Choose from our sponsor levels or propose your own.
